UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Engineered chimeric peptides with antimicrobial and titanium-binding functions to inhibit biofilm formation on Ti implants.
Literature.Reference: Mater Sci Eng C Mater Biol Appl. 2018;82:141-154
Literature.Author: Geng H, Yuan Y, Adayi A, Zhang X, Song X, Gong L, Gao P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus oralis ATCC 9811(MIC=640µg/ml),Streptococcus oralis ATCC 9811(MBC=1280µg/ml),Streptococcus gordonii ATCC 10558(MIC=640-1280µg/ml),Streptococcus gordonii ATCC 10558(MBC=2560µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MIC=700µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MBC=2400-2560µg/ml)
